response.job_title: Senior Software Engineering at STÖRK-TRONIC, Störk GmbH & Co. KG
response.summary:
The purpose of my life is to increase the synergy of humanity to get the best version of humankind. I know that it is a great challenge, but I work hard every day to fulfill this purpose. I am very good at teamwork. I love guiding my colleagues by sharing my knowledge about software development. Everything, from how to use flex in CSS to how to create an architecture in microservices to be resilient and distributed. Because my purpose is easier if I am not alone.

I love solving complex problems or challenges, creativity is a remarkable feature of my personality and work. I usually have leadership roles and I love to talk to everyone a lot until things are clear.

At my work I am very attentive to making DevOpsSec culture pervasive on my teammates, I usually explain how the software or infrastructure interacts with each other, so that developers do their job much better and safely. In parallel improving and adding functionalities to the infrastructure platform that we create for developers, so that they can use and operate it.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Desarrollo de software, Node.js, Investigación, Robótica, Programación, Matlab, Java, C++, JavaScript, AngularJS, React.js, Ionic Framework, Amazon Web Services, Google Analytics, Python, Django, HTML, C#, Linux

profile_positions.description: Work on modular front and micro services, applying the best practices of DevOps approach.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineering

profile_positions.description:
Work on all infrastructure needs in all S4N projects, applying the best practices supported by S4N, being consistent with the needs of each project, and applying the DevSecOps approach.
Technologies: Terraform, Flux, Ansible, GCP, Kubernetes, GitLab CI/CD
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer

profile_positions.description: Desarrollador de aplicaciones híbridas con React Native
profile_positions.title: Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description: Diseñar arquitecturas para las nuevos proyectos y optimizar los ya existentes, creación de apps full stack en diferentes ambientes
profile_positions.title: Arquitecto de software

company.name: STÖRK-TRONIC, Störk GmbH & Co. KG
company.description:
Störk-Tronic in Stuttgart is one of the leading manufacturers for electronic measuring and control technology for cooling and heating systems. The competency and innovation of our company is based on close cooperation with our partners, which translates into customer-specific solutions

Where our products are used, it is important to connect efficiency with the most modern technology – Störk-Tronic can offer networked systems in medicine, the food industry and in engineering. As a manufacturer our commitment is to deliver firstclass products. This is guaranteed through the use of the best components, our stringent testing and commended quality control systems. From board level to manufacturing every employee is committed to total quality management, from precision production and testing to open, honest partnerships with our customers and suppliers.

As a company we are also committed to taking care of the environment, during our production processes we guarantee that as little energy as possible and only as much as necessary is used. 

Our subsidiaries:
